attributes.action: Allow people to vote against petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petitions are only ever supported.  We the undersigned wish to actively highlight our dissatisfaction at a given petition and NOT passively ignore the ignorance of this country.  Let all petitions be a net position of opinion. This country is going to the dogs.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.  Please note, however, that the reasons for not allowing a 'sign against' option are given in the FAQ (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/faq).
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
